title: Middlemarch - relationship of husband and wife

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Eliot uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex relationship of the husband and wife.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Eliot uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex relationship of the husband and wife.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
